summary: This document is a declaration by Thelma Guzman, a custodian of records at T-Mobile US, Inc., certifying the authenticity of records related to Case No. 2520474. It outlines the nature of the records and affirms their accuracy under penalty of perjury.

persons.name: Thelma Guzman
persons.context: Thelma Guzman attests to the authenticity of records maintained by T-Mobile US, Inc. in relation to a legal case.

keyFacts: Thelma Guzman is employed by T-Mobile US, Inc. as a custodian of records.
The document certifies the authenticity of records related to Case No. 2520474.
The records include call details and subscriber information from January 1, 2018, to October 22, 2019.
The certification is intended to satisfy specific rules of evidence.
Guzman acknowledges the legal implications of providing false information.
